Address.label: Address
Address.value: 525 WASHINGTON BOULEVARD SUITE 1400, JERSEY CITY, New Jersey, 7310, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: AvePoint Inc is a Microsoft 365 data management solutions provider, offering a full suite of SaaS solutions to migrate, manage and protect data. Its products include Cloud Products, Hybrid Products; and solutions include Data Protection, Operational Governance, Records & Information Management, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint Online, Exchange Online, OneDrive for Business, Project Online, Planner, Yammer, and Public Folders.
